column4: Do I get the Wine Windows Program Loader, or the Wine Microsoft Windows Compatibility Layer?
From the software center, i search wine, which one di I get?
My comp os .99 gbs ram and 1.60 ghz so... edbian
Im booting from USB, is there a way to keep my settings etc when the comp restarts?
use persistance, i'd recommend ~1gb depending on size of usb
universal usb installer will help you set that up
allows persistance of files over rebood
it's what you are asking for -.-
for the third time, set up a usb with ubuntu with persistance
or universal usb installer in windows
google-foo is not strong with this one
persistance is space on the usb defined to store ubuntu settings and files over reboots
Ah. All I want is WINE for iTunes and redsn0w
that's what you are going to have to do
